errors.serverNotSupported: This client does not support login on "{server}" homeserver. Password and SSO based login method not found.
errors.serverNotAllowed: Login with custom server not allowed by your client instance.
errors.invalidServer: Failed to find your Matrix ID server.
errors.invalidRequest: Failed to login. Part of your request data is invalid.
errors.rateLimited: Failed to login. Your login request has been rate-limited by server, Please try after some time.

general.title: General
general.languageDescription: Choose your preferred language for the interface.

systemTheme.title: System Theme
systemTheme.description: Choose between light and dark theme based on system preference.

theme.title: Theme
theme.description: Theme to use when system theme is not enabled.

editor.title: Editor
editor.enterForNewlineDescription: Use {key} + ENTER to send message and ENTER for newline.
editor.hideTypingReadReceiptsDescription: Turn off both typing status and read receipts to keep your activity private.

system.title: System
system.desktopNotificationsDescription: Show desktop notifications when message arrive.
system.notificationPermissionBlocked: Notification permission is blocked. Please allow notification permission from browser address bar.
system.notificationsNotSupported: Notifications are not supported by the system.
system.notificationSoundDescription: Play sound when new message arrive.
system.noEmailAttached: Your account does not have any email attached.

keywordMessages.title: Keyword Messages
keywordMessages.selectKeywordDescription: Set a notification preference for message containing given keyword.

blockMessages.title: Block Messages
blockMessages.description: This option has been moved to "Account > Block Users" section.

global.title: Global Account Data
global.description: View and edit account data stored on your account.

devices.title: Devices

verification.title: Device Verification
verification.description: To verify device identity and grant access to encrypted messages.

steps.title: Steps to verify from other device.
steps.findDevice: Find this device in Devices/Sessions section.
steps.noVerifiedDevice: If you do not have any verified device press the "Verify Manually" button.

other.title: Other Devices

deviceDashboard.title: Device Dashboard
deviceDashboard.description: Open device dashboard to manage your devices.

other.authNotSupported: Authentication steps to perform this action are not supported by client.

devices.deviceNamePublic: Device names are visible to public.

unverified.title: Unverified
unverified.description: Start verification from other device or verify manually.

export.title: Export Messages Data
export.description: Save password protected copy of encryption data on your device to decrypt messages later.

import.title: Import Messages Data
import.description: Load password protected copy of encryption data from device to decrypt your messages.

clearCache.title: Clear Cache & Reload
clearCache.description: Clear all cached data and reload the app.

removeDialog.title: Remove Avatar
removeDialog.message: Are you sure you want to remove profile avatar?

email.title: Email Address
email.description: Email address attached to your account.

selectUser.title: Select User
selectUser.description: Prevent receiving messages or invites from user by adding their userId.

emojisStickers.title: Emojis & Stickers

imagesUsage.title: Images Usage
imagesUsage.description: Select how the images are being used: as emojis, as stickers, or as both.

uploadImages.title: Upload Images
uploadImages.description: Select images from your storage to upload them in pack.
